features: ALL MAGIC. NO TRICKS. – Reach for a Natural Citrus-Based Odor Eliminator Air Freshener that uses the power of Citrus oils to eliminate troublesome odors and sprinkle the air with freshness, without just water and aerosols
REVITALIZING SCENTS – The juicy freshness of our specially curated air freshener room spray will fill your home with the magical hues of “ahhh, that smells good"
SAFE INGREDIENTS – Our thoughtfully chosen, cruelty-free ingredients are pet-safe, kid-safe, and of course, super-busy-parent safe when used as directed
360DISPENSE – Our recyclable 360Dispense packaging technology provides continuous spray action in any direction without the use of propellants

YOUR NEW FAVORITE – Spritz the whimsical magic of clean to instantly liven your home and rest easy knowing our products are made without harsh chemicals like propellants, formaldehyde, parabens, and more!
body.description: Spritz the magical freshness and swirling, revitalizing scents of a Natural Citrus Magic Spray Air Freshener to bring every nook and cranny of your home to life. Top off your cleaning routine, spray before a guest arrives, reminisce memories, or lift your mood with a burst of a Natural Citrus-Based Spray made with pure citrus oils. With our 100% active ingredients you are getting a spray that is completely full of ingredients that work for you to eliminate odors without wasting money on water and aerosols. Our products are safe when used as directed, free from harsh chemicals like parabens, formaldehyde, phthalates, benzene, and more, and proud to be cruelty-free. Find your favorite scent to express yourself and spray your personality in the spaces you love! Some call it science. We call it magic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is amazing! It smells so good and isn't artificial smelling or headache inducing. I am a caretaker for my husband who has cancer, and we find ourselves at the cancer center multiple times a week. The area where he gets his treatment is out of the way in a more secluded area of the building, with 2 single bathrooms off the beaten path of most foot traffic. Well, you know what happens in secluded bathrooms in a public space...I don't think I need to elaborate. Anyway, I live on coffee and have to pee a lot and I started really dreading going into the bathrooms nearby. I'm talking gag inducing stuff here. I got this because I didn't want to be spraying chemicals where cancer patients frequent and the size of the can is perfect for my purse. Now I hold my breath before I go into the bathroom and spray this quick in front of me. It takes care of any and all odors in an instant! No more dread and I love the fresh orange scent. So good! It's worth the money for me to keep everyone safe and not breathing in garbage, and it works so well, it's just worth it 100%. I will continue to buy this for at home too. Sometimes I spritz it not to cover anything up, but just because I love the smell of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is really for pillows to make them smell fresh and nice. But, it freshens up the room too, like your best spray. Fantastic scent. One canister lasts a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Usually when you spray Febreze when taking a dump it's smells like Febreze and farts.When you spray this stuff it's so strong it doesn't smell like farts. I don't know what they put in this stuff but it smells like someone is zesting a lemon right next to you while you're sitting on the toilet. It's not that strong but for some reason it just displaces any smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A pleasant citrus scent
reviews.reviewText: Haven't used it much, but it sure smells nice. Cans seem on the light side ( used to aerosol cans, but had the same concern with my Arm & Hammer spray foot powder and that lasts quite a while).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a parrots and they are sensitive to smells so I was looking for something with the least amount of chemicals. This product helps me keep the bathroom areas refreshed when needed and doesnt bother my birds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instantly transform the atmosphere with a burst of refreshing citrus fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried the Citrus Magic Natural Odor-Eliminating Air Freshener Spray in the Orange Blast scent, and I am thoroughly impressed! Not only does it instantly transform the atmosphere with a burst of refreshing citrus fragrance, but it also effectively tackles odors, leaving my home smelling clean and invigorating. I appreciate that it's made with natural ingredients, making it safe for my family and pets. The convenient spray bottle design allows for easy application in various areas, from living rooms to bathrooms. Say goodbye to unpleasant odors and hello to a delightful citrus-filled environment – I highly recommend the Citrus Magic Air Freshener Spray!

reviews.reviewTitle: best air freshener on the market
reviews.reviewText: This is a natural air freshener with a fresh citrus scent that completely destroys odors. We use it mostly in the bathroom but it works great in the kitchen too!

Yes, a bit more expensive than other (artificial harmful air fresheners) but this is natural and smells like you just peeled a fresh orange. It works great for all odors and if you need to remove greasy or sticky substances off glass or stainless steel it works amazing!

reviews.reviewTitle: I guess they will go into the garbage. The containers are smaller than I purchased before ...
reviews.reviewText: I used to order these using the 1-800 number on the bottle. I believe it came from Toronto. I live just outside Toronto. Then my husband saw them on Amazon.ca and we ordered the orange scent. He wants to throw out all of our other room deodorants, saying they are fake smelling and he hates them. So, I guess they will go into the garbage. The containers are smaller than I purchased before but isn't that the same with a lot of products these days. The scent is refreshing, not fake and definitely works for eliminating odors.

I have love this for years.Pros:Lasts a long time. Only need short spritz.Very effective air freshener.No aerosol propellants.Very clean citrus scent.Cons:Wish they sold a variety pack of my favourite fragrances; orange, lemon, and tropical.Hard to find in local stores now. Used to be easier to find and there was a competing similar product that was as good or better, not available now.Kind of expensive.Finally:Worth while even at this price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Now have the orange and the lime
reviews.reviewText: Personally I didn't think the bottles were too small.The scent is great. Like standing in an orange grove. Also, the nice orange scent does last quite a good while.Nothing at all like the nose offensive Fabreeze.I also just purchased the lime scent. It is quite nice. It is not as strong a scent as the Orange but that is OK.Will definitely buy again.
